title: BOC Banking App Redesign
description: Led a UI/UX redesign project for the BOC banking app, improving navigation, accessibility, and user satisfaction through wireframing and usability testing.

title: Student Management System
description: Developed a system for efficient student data management with full CRUD functionality using Java.

title: Life on Land (SDG) Web Project
description: Designed an interactive website to raise awareness about environmental sustainability using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: Built a budgeting tool in Python to help users manage expenses and track their savings effectively.

title: BabyQ App (SDGP)
description: Developing a childcare and medical record management app using React Native, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Features include appointment booking, digital records, and doctor search.

title: Real-Time Ticketing System
description: Built a real-time event ticket booking system with React, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Implemented multi-threading and producer-consumer logic to manage concurrent reservations.
